UTF-8 Conversion Information

All, Posted here is a zip file that contains the conversion rules from ASCII to UTF-8. This should give you the information to determine what the level of effort would be to program these rules into your systems. Mintes of yesterday’s meeting should be posted on Monday Nov. 11th. Read More —
